dict.acceptation: 蜂窝式便携无线电话，大哥大；手机；

sent.orig: For the above-mentioned reasons, cellphone online sales will be an inevitale trend.
sent.trans: 因此，手机的网络营销将会是一股不可阻挡的潮流。

sent.orig: It's funded in part by the European Union, in part a cellphone industry group.
sent.trans: 该研究由欧盟及部门手机产业公司赞助。

sent.orig: Yahoo has reduced the complexity of the cellphone graphical user interface (GUI) with its Go redesign.
sent.trans: 无论屏幕有多大，该服务给我留下深刻印象的不是画面的清晰度，而是界面的清晰度。

sent.orig: Surely you could use some help in turning Motorola's flagging cellphone business around?
sent.trans: 当然你可以任用你周围的人，来帮助摩托罗拉公司实现手机业务的逆转？

sent.orig: He let his cellphone vibrate, and ring beside him doing nothing about it.
sent.trans: 他任凭手机在一旁震响，也不理会。
